participant_1.background:

i just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education.
i wish i could play the stock market well.

When I'm not taking care of my family, I like to go off-roading in my truck.

participant_2.background:
I hold my loved ones closest to my heart because they are the ones who matter most.
my favorite food is meatloaf.
i am gong to adopt a dog very soon.
I'll keep painting portraits of my dogs as a way to express myself without revealing my secret passion to my conservative family.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
Doing well, I just got a job as a dog groomer.
Oh, that's great! I have always wanted to own a dog but I am allergic to shellfish.
I am allergic to shellfish as well but I am going to adopt a dog soon.
That's great! I just graduated from college and I wish I could play the stock market well.
I will keep painting portraits of my dogs as a way to express myself without revealing my secret passion to my conservative family.
That's a great idea! I like to take my boat out on the weekends and just relax, not really doing anything productive.
That sounds like a great way to relax! I hold my loved ones closest to my heart because they are the ones who matter most.
That's a great way to live life!
